title: At pre-sentencing hearing for HK national security case, judges hear defendant made 'stupid' mistake
content:
1. At pre-sentencing hearing for HK national security case, judges hear defendant made 'stupid' mistake  Reuters
  2. Lawyer for Hong Kong protester asks court for shorter term  Associated Press
  3. ‘Liberate Hong Kong’ slogan ‘very risky’, scholars, experts warn after ruling  South China Morning Post
  4. The EU needs to step up on Hong Kong sanctions  EURACTIV
  5. China poised to impose anti-sanctions law on Hong Kong  Nikkei Asia
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 香港の国家機密事件の判決前公聴会で、裁判官は被告が「愚かな」ミスを犯したことを聞いた。
在香港国家安全案的判前听证会上，法官听到被告犯了 "愚蠢 "的错误
在香港國家安全案的判前聽證會上，法官聽到被告犯了 "愚蠢 "的錯誤
